name: Chromosome 3 Status
title: Chromosome 3 Status
notes:
**Note 1:** Physician statement of chromosome 3 status can be used to code this data item when no other information is available.

**Note 2:** Monosomy 3, especially if combined with a frequently coexisting gain in chromosome 8q, is independently associated with metastatic risk. Chromosome 3 and 8 statuses may be determined with karyotyping or fluorescent in situ hybridization (FISH). 

**Note 3:** See also Chromosome 8q Status (NAACCR Data Item #3822)
rows: Test ordered, results not in chart

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code 8 may result in an edit error.)

Not documented in patient record
Chromosome 3 status not assessed or unknown if assessed
